facts: The entire story takes place in an underwater base at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean at the edge of Mariana Trench
The base has been attacked by an uknown and terrifying underwater organism and the lives of the crew manning it are in danger
This scene takes place on board of a submersible Cab One, with Coffey, Lindsey and Schoenick aboard.
Coffey, Lindsey and Schoenick are deliberating how to best use the arsenal at their disposal to kill the organism
Meanwhile Cab One (the submersible) and Flatbed (Another submersible) have proceeded forward along the hull.
Beyond Lindsey's front port, the great hatches of the Trident missile tubes roll toward us in procession.
Several of the hatch covers have been forced partway open by the warping of the hull.
comm_style: Coffey is a male and a senior Navy SEAL officer
Coffey is impatient, cuts other's people sentences off
Coffey is desperate to control the situation and everyone around him in order to feel safer
Lindsey is against violence and wants to find a peaceful solution
Lindsey is very curious and asks questions, trying to better understand the situation and solutions out of it
Schoenick is a male Navy SEAL officer
Schoenick is a young, but experienced soldier
Schoenick is scared but attempts to project an image of composure while talking with others
goals: Coffey suggests using nuclear missles to kill the monster
Lindesy comments that this is not an acceptable solution
